Name: Ayan
AboutMe:
I am a post-graduate student in Computer Technology at Jadavpur University.

I like anything related to computers since the age of 10. In programming languages I am quite comfortable with C, C++, C# and Java. Besides these I also know a little bit of Python, Visual Basic, PL/SQL and PHP. I also like writing shell scripts and batch files.

I enjoy learning about new technologies and gadgets and it is needless to say that I also enjoy coding. I am also an avid gamer and like playing real-time strategy, action-adventure, racing and simulation games. I am not a huge fan of FPS and turn-based strategy games.

Apart from technology, I like listening to music and watching BPL football matches, I am a huge supporter of Manchester United. I am also a foodie and enjoy hanging out with my friends.

My flair.
